author: leif
msg: Up the required Wrapper version to 3.0.3 because previous 3.0.x versions had
some stability problems.

author: leif
msg: Add an optional attribute to connector definitons so that if they fail to be
configured the user can control whether that should affect whether or not the
entire InstrumentManager fails to be configured.  By default it does not.  This
was done to prevent a bind failure by the Altrmi connector from causing an
entire application to fail to startup.

author: leif
msg: Update the debug log messages so they all include both the name of the logger
as well as the current thread name.  A big help when trying to figure out what is
happening in the multi threaded chaos that is a thread pool.  Nice when they work
but when things are going wrong, debugging can have unexpected consequences
on your sanity.

author: leif
msg: Make the time based tests less sensitive to external loads at the time the test is
run by increasing the window on time comparisons from 100ms to 500ms.

author: leif
msg: Fixed a bad thread leak.  When a worker thread was trimmed from a thread pool it
was entering a wait state rather than terminating, this was leading to the pool
thinking it was freed.  Over time this would lead to an impressive number of idle
threads...
Also added a detail child logger so that problems like this can be more easily
tracked down by being able to set the main logger to DEBUG, and reduce the
total output by setting the detail child logger to INFO.
